import React,{useState} from 'react'; import api from '../api/api'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function Login(){ const [email,setEmail]=useState(''); const [password,setPassword]=useState(''); const [error,setError]=useState(null); const nav = useNavigate(); const submit = async (e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); try{ const res = await api.post('/auth/login',{ email, password }); localStorage.setItem('token', res.data.token); nav('/dashboard'); }catch(err){ setError(err.response?.data?.message || 'Login failed'); } }; return (
